Request #1

Type: Enhancement

Description: Please add another window that will display the contents of the Key window in a resizable, word wrapped window.  This will allow the user to stretch the window horizontally, which in turn will allow you to see the text without cr/lf's. (i.e. easier to read the whole string as 2 or 3 rows instead of 20.
